column2: Logic is the beginning of wisdom, not the end.” — Spock
“Highly illogical.” — Spock
“You can use logic to justify almost anything. That’s its power. And it’s flaw.” — Captain Cathryn Janeway
“I fail to comprehend your indignation, sir. I have simply made the logical deduction that you are a liar” — Spock
“You may find that having is not so pleasing a thing as wanting. This is not logical, but it is often true. — Spock
“I canna’ change the laws of physics.” — Montgomery “Scotty” Scott

“I realize that command does have its fascination, even under circumstances such as these, but I neither enjoy the idea of command nor am I frightened of it. It simply exists, and I will do whatever logically needs to be done.” — Spock
“Live long, and prosper.” — Spock
“Things are only impossible until they’re not.” — Captain Kirk
“Insufficient facts always invite danger.” — Spock
“Change is the essential process of all existence.”— Spock
“Without freedom of choice there is no creativity.” — Captain Kirk
“In critical moments, men sometimes see exactly what they wish to see.” — Spock
“One man cannot summon the future.” — Spock
“But one man can change the present!” — Captain Kirk
“The prejudices people feel about each other disappear when they get to know each other.” — Captain Kirk
“If we’re going to be damned, let’s be damned for what we really are.” — Jean-Luc Picard
“Without followers, evil cannot spread.” — Spock
“Curious, how often you humans manage to obtain that which you do not want.”— Spock
“A species that enslaves other beings is hardly superior — mentally or otherwise.” — Captain Kirk
“Evil does seek to maintain power by suppressing the truth.” — Spock
“A lie is a very poor way to say hello.” – Edith Keeler
“Time is fluid…like a river with currents, eddies, backwash.” — Spock
“When governments murder those who speak the truth, it is time to get new governments.”  ― Diane Duane
“Time is the fire in which we burn.” ― Malcolm McDowell J. M. Dillard
“If there are self-made purgatories, then we all have to live in them.”— Spock
“… The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few.” — Spock
“It is possible to commit no errors and still lose. That is not a weakness. That is life.” — Jean-Luc Picard
“It is the lot of ‘man’ to strive no matter how content he is.” — Spock
“There is a way out of every box, a solution to every puzzle; it’s just a matter of finding it.” — Jean-Luc Picard
“A man either lives life as it happens to him, meets it head-on and licks it, or he turns his back on it and starts to wither away.” — Dr. Boyce
“Live now; make now always the most precious time. Now will never come again.” — Jean-Luc Picard
“With the first link, the chain is forged. The first speech censored, the first thought forbidden, the first freedom denied, chains us all irrevocably.” — Jean-Luc Picard
“Our species can only survive if we have obstacles to overcome. You remove those obstacles. Without them to strengthen us, we will weaken and die.” — Captain James T. Kirk
“Perhaps man wasn’t meant for paradise. Maybe he was meant to claw, to scratch all the way.” — Captain James T. Kirk

“You know the greatest danger facing us is ourselves, and irrational fear of the unknown. There is no such thing as the unknown. Only things temporarily hidden, temporarily not understood.” — Captain James T. Kirk

“Now, I don’t pretend to tell you how to find happiness and love, when every day is a struggle to survive. But I do insist that you do survive, because the days and the years ahead are worth living for!” — Edith Keeler
“To survive is not enough. To simply exist… is not enough!” – Roga Danar
“It’s not safe out here. It’s wondrous, with treasures to satiate desires both subtle and gross; but it’s not for the timid.” ― Q

“Your will to survive, your love of life, your passion to know … Everything that is truest and best in all species of beings has been revealed to you. Those are the qualities that make a civilization worthy to survive.” ― Lai the Vian
You might also like these memorable Supernatural quotes about light and darkness.
“Compassion: that’s the one things no machine ever had. Maybe it’s the one thing that keeps men ahead of them.” — Dr. McCoy
“We prefer to help ourselves. We make mistakes, but we’re human–and maybe that’s the word that best explains us.” — Captain James T. Kirk
“Improve a mechanical device and you may double productivity. But improve man, you gain a thousandfold.” — Khan Noonien Singh
“I am pleased to see that we have differences. May we together become greater than the sum of both of us.” — Surak
“Computers make excellent and efficient servants, but I have no wish to serve under them.” — Spock
“To boldly go where no man has gone before.” — Captain James T. Kirk
“To all mankind — may we never find space so vast, planets so cold, heart and mind so empty that we cannot fill them with love and warmth”. — Garth
“Humans do have an amazing capacity for believing what they choose — and excluding that which is painful.” — Spock
“Pain is a thing of the mind. The mind can be controlled.” — Spock
“Improve a mechanical device and you may double productivity. But improve man, you gain a thousandfold.”— Khan Noonian Singh
“To be human is to be complex. You can’t avoid a little ugliness — from within — and from without.” — Captain James T. Kirk
Your eyes can deceive you; don’t trust them. – Obi-wan KenobiDo—
do or do not. There is no try. – Yoda
In my experience, there’s no such thing as luck. – Obi-wan Kenobi
Never tell me the odds. – Han Solo
Luminous beings are we, not this crude matter. – Obi-wan Kenobi
Once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny. – Yoda
Your focus determines your reality. – Qui-Gon JinnI
find your lack of faith disturbing. – Darth Vader
Let go of your hate. – Luke Skywalker
Fear leads to anger, anger leads to hate, hate leads to suffering. – Yoda
I was not elected to watch my people suffer and die while you discuss this invasion in a committee. – Queen Amidala
In a dark place we find ourselves, and a little more knowledge lights our way. – Yoda
There’s always a bigger fish. – Qui-gon Jinn
Who’s the more foolish; the fool, or the fool who follows him? – Obi-wan Kenobi
Keep your concentration here and now, where it belongs. – Qui-Gon Jinn
This is a new day, a new beginning. – Ahsoka Tano
Compassion, which I would define as unconditional love, is essential to a Jedi’s life. So you might say that we are encouraged to love. – Anakin Skywalker
The fear of loss is a path to the dark side. – Yoda
Great, kid. Don’t get cocky. – Han Solo
So this is how liberty dies… with thunderous applause. – Queen Amidala
Mind tricks don’t work on me. – Watto
The Force will be with you. Always. – Obi-Wan Kenobi
You were my brother, Anakin. I loved you. – Obi-Wan Kenobi
I’ll never turn to the dark side. You’ve failed, your highness. I am a Jedi, like my father before me. – Luke Skywalker
Just for once, let me look on you with my own eyes. – Anakin Skywalker
You can’t stop the change, any more than you can stop the suns from setting. – Shmi Skywalker
In time, the suffering of your people will persuade you to see our point of view. – Nute Gunray
When gone am I, the last of the Jedi will you be. The Force runs strong in your family. Pass on what you have learned. – Yoda
We must keep our faith in the Republic. The day we stop believing democracy can work is the day we lose it. – Queen Jamillia
Well, if droids could think, there’d be none of us here, would there? – Obi-Wan Kenobi
I’m just a simple man trying to make my way in the universe. – Jango Fett
What if I told you that the Republic was now under the control of a Dark Lord of the Sith? – Count Dooku
The dark side of the Force is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be unnatural. – Chancellor Palpatine
You are the Chosen One. You have brought balance to this world. Stay on this path, and you will do it again for the galaxy. But beware your heart. – The Father
If you define yourself by your power to take life, your desire to dominate, to possess, then you have nothing. – Obi-Wan Kenobi
To die for one’s people is a great sacrifice. To live for one’s people, an even greater sacrifice. I choose to live for my people. – Riyo Chuchi
Remember, my dear Obi-Wan. I’ve loved you always. I always will. – Duchess Satine Kryze
The Sith killed each other, victims of their own greed. But from the ashes of their destruction, I was the last survivor. – Darth Bane
You know, no matter how much we fought, I’ve always hated watching you leave. – Leia Organa
Oh, my dear friend. How I’ve missed you. – C-3PO
I’m one with the Force. The Force is with me. – Chirrut Îmwe
Every time I walked away from something I wanted to forget, I told myself it was for a cause that I believed in. A cause that was worth it. Without that, we’re lost. – Cassian Andor
Someday I will be the most powerful Jedi ever. – Anakin Skywalker
If you strike me down I shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine. – Obi-Wan Kenobi
At last we will reveal ourselves to the Jedi. At last we will have revenge. – Darth Maul
I’ve been waiting for you, Obi-Wan. We meet again, at last. The circle is now complete. When I left you, I was but the learner; now I am the master. – Darth Vader
Luke, you can destroy the Emperor. He has foreseen this. It is your destiny. Join me, and together we can rule the galaxy as father and son. – Darth Vader
Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose. – Yoda
I have taught you everything I know. And you have become a far greater Jedi than I could ever hope to be. – Obi-Wan Kenobi
Search your feelings, you know you to be true. – Darth Vader
Don’t be too proud of this technological terror you’ve constructed. The ability to destroy a planet is insignificant next to the power of the Force. – Darth Vader
You’re coming with me. I’ll not leave you here, I’ve got to save you. – Luke Skywalker
My ally is the Force, and a powerful ally it is. – Yoda
I fear nothing. For all is as the Force wills it. – Chirrut Imwe
You were the chosen one! It was said that you would destroy the Sith, not join them. You were to bring balance to the force, not leave it in darkness. – Obi-Wan Kenobi
Be careful not to choke on your aspirations. – Darth Vader
Hello. I don’t believe we have been introduced. R2-D2? A pleasure to meet you. I am C-3PO, Human-Cyborg Relations. – C-3PO
Always in motion is the future. – Yoda
Women always figure out the truth. Always. – Han Solo
You may dispense with the pleasantries, Commander. I am here to put you back on schedule. – Darth Vader
You serve your master well. And you will be rewarded. – Luke Skywalker
Sometimes we must let go of our pride and do what is requested of us. – Padme Amidala
Oh no, my young Jedi. You will find that it is you who are mistaken, about a great many things. – The Emperor
Don’t call me a mindless philosopher, you overweight glob of grease. – C-3PO
Many of the truths that we cling to depend on our point of view. – Obi Wan
You are unwise to lower your defenses! – Darth Vader
When 900 years old, you reach… Look as good, you will not. – Yoda
Something inside me has always been there, but now it’s awake. – Rey
Truly wonderful the mind of a child is. – Yoda
You don’t know how hard I found it, signing the order to terminate your life. – Grand Moff Tarkin
Now, be brave and don’t look back. Don’t look back. – Shmi Skywalker
I sense great fear in you, Skywalker. You have hate. You have anger. But you don’t use them. – Count Dooku
Much to learn you still have… my old Padawan. – Yoda
Master Yoda says I should be mindful of the future… but not at the expense of the moment. – Qui Gon Jinn
Death is a natural part of life. Rejoice for those around you who transform into the Force. – Yoda
The Force is strong with you. A powerful Sith you will become. Henceforth, you shall be known as Darth… Vader. – Emperor Palpatine
Let the past die. Kill it if you have to. – Kylo Ren
Oh my. Space travel sound rather perilous. I can assure you they will never get me on one of those dreadful Star Ships. – C-3P0
He is as clumsy as he is stupid. General, prepare your troops for a surface attack. – Darth Vader
Luke, I don’t want to lose you to the Emperor the way I lost Vader. – Obi-wan Kenobi
You look absolutely beautiful. You truly belong here with us among the clouds. – Lando
When you look at the dark side, careful you must be… for the dark side looks back. – Yoda
She may not look like much, but she’s got it where it counts, kid. – Hans Solo
The ability to speak does not make you intelligent. – Qui-Gon Jinn
Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid. – Han Solo
There is no escape! Don’t make me destroy you. Luke, you do not yet realize your importance. You’ve only begun to discover your power! – Darth Vader
You will know when you are calm, at peace, passive. A Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack. – Yoda
When I found you, I saw raw, untamed power, and beyond that, something truly special. – Supreme Leader Snoke
Judge me by my size, do you? – Yoda
Be mindful of your thoughts Anakin. They’ll betray you. – Obi-Wan Kenobi
Anakin, you’re breaking my heart! And you’re going down a path I cannot follow! – Padme Amidala
The force is strong with this one. – Darth Vader
A George Lucas creation – Star Wars is incredible because it is extremely diverse… it is an adventure, a love story, sci-fi, action movie plus fantasy combined.
To me, watching Star Wars is like going to an international buffet when I don’t know what I’m craving. It has EVERYTHING!
Star Wars is controversial, people either like it or hate it.
Before I decided to commit myself to watch all of Star Wars movies, I asked my friends to describe Star Wars in a word.
People described it as Hope, Poetry, Joy, Luminous, Mythic, and even Kaboom… but Boring is a word I never hear from anyone.
Which is a good thing because the last thing I want is to waste hours watching boring movies about wars that happened in a galaxy far far away.
Here are some of the most memorable quotes that I have found in Star Wars so you can reminisce over your childhood memories and be inspired to rewatch the entire saga.
